title: Water Supply Development Project (JBIC Loan No. SL - P90) Towns North of Colombo Water Supply Project. Tender for Supply and Installation of Electro-Mechanical Equipment Contract No : WSDP / TNC / EM 1
decision_details: - this project is being implemented with loan funds provided by the Government of Japan through Japan International Cooperation Agency (JAICA).  Supply and installation of Electro-Mechanical Equipment are components of this project.  Cabinet approval was granted to award the above tender to M/s. Kubota Corporation & Lanka Development Network Pvt. Ltd.
